topic.title: How to Create a WebHelp Responsive
topic.shortdesc: The following topic includes information on how to transform the content in a LwDITA map into a WebHelp Responsive.

ol.li: Click on the button with a wrench and a red arrow pointing upwards.
Select the check box next to the title, "WebHelp Resonsive."
Click edit in order to chose a theme. The pop-up box should look like this.
